benefits.title: Connect with other resonators!
benefits.problem: No more searching for strangers on Facebook to go to concerts with.
benefits.solution: Resonance suggests users who attended similar events.

benefits.title: Find your lost buddies!
benefits.problem: No more worrying about your friends getting lost at events.
benefits.solution: Resonance allows you to contact your buddies when you have no service.

benefits.title: Get discounts on merch!
benefits.problem: No more worrying about the tall guy in front of you filming the entire concert.
benefits.solution: Resonance gives you more points the longer you keep that phone tucked in your pocket.
